Uttarapurana is a Jain text composed by Acharya Gunabhadra in 9th century CE.[1]

Citations[edit]

  1. ^ Jaini 1998, p. 78.

Sources[edit]

  • Jaini, Padmanabh S. (1998) [1979], The Jaina Path of Purification, Delhi: Motilal Banarsidass, ISBN 81-208-1578-5
